Detailed Description

The NXT player Stage Driver.

This is the main part of the driver, it is based off the example driver included in the player stage source. The class for the driver

int NXTDriver::ProcessMessage ( QueuePointer &  resp_queue,
player_msghdr *  hdr,
void *  data 
) [virtual]

This method will be invoked on each incoming message.

Process messages here. Send a response if necessary, using Publish(). If you handle the message successfully, return 0. Otherwise, return -1, and a NACK will be sent for you, if a response is required.
